text: Joosia is a genus of flowering plants in the family Rubiaceae. There are at least 11 species. They are distributed from Panama to Bolivia with the center of diversity in Ecuador.Andersson, L. (1997). A New Revision of Joosia (Rubiaceae-Cinchoneae). Brittonia, 24-44. Species include: * Joosia aequatoria Steyerm. *Joosia antioquiana * Joosia longisepala L.Andersson * Joosia macrocalyx Standl. ex Steyerm. *Joosia multiflora * Joosia obtusa L.Andersson * Joosia oligantha L.Andersson * Joosia standleyana Steyerm. == References == Category:Rubiaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Joosia
